If your business does Min $10,000 gross sales per month and has been open for Min 10 Months, then apply for Business loan and receive funding without the use of personal guarantees or collateral as assets.

We don’t not require any personal information since the loan is based on monthly revenue of your business. This is a non-restrictive loan, allowing you the ability to spend the full amount of the loan any way you deem necessary for your business such as paying off or consolidating debt, hiring more employees, marketing or any other means you as the business owner feels necessary.

If you have received this email it already means that your odds of getting at least 100k WITH NO PERSONAL GUARANTEE is 98%!

FILL OUT THE SIMPLE 1 PAGE APPLICATION BY VISITING at: www.MultiBusinessFinancial.club

Your Business Loan is Based on your business monthly revenue. You must have a business bank account to get our business loan or merchant cash advance.

Quick approval process, with funding occurring in as little as 5 days Poor credit is not a problem Use capital for any business expense Repayment is tailored to meet your business’s unique cash flow model

​Sincerely Yours​, Multi Business Financial Business loan $10k-$1M. No Upfront or Processing fees.
